div.bibl: The Jewish Charities, Report Book for 1936. [THE CHICAGO HOME FOR JEWISH ORPHANS]

body.p: The Chicago Home for Jewish Orphans was organized in 1894 and since that time has cared for 1,233 children. The Home is equipped to serve children ranging in age from 6 to 17, particularly such children as benefit from group life. In 1935 an average of 122 children were under its care.
